name: Easy Chicken Parmesan
author: Cracker Barrel
summary: The super thing about this dish is that you get full flavour without having to brown the chicken.
ingredients: 6 tablespoons CRACKER BARREL Finely Shredded 100% Parmesan Cheese
1 ½ cups CRACKER BARREL Shredded Mozzarella Cheese
directions: Heat oven to 375 degrees F (190 degrees C)
Pour sauce into 13x9-inch baking dish sprayed with cooking spray
Add chicken; turn to evenly coat both sides of each breast with sauce
Bake 30 minutes or until chicken is done (165 degrees F)
Meanwhile, cook spaghetti as directed on package, omitting salt
Top chicken with remaining cheeses; bake, uncovered, 5 minutes or until mozzarella is melted
Serve topped with chicken and sauce
